projects.title: Psyches of Color
projects.description: As a developer for TSE, I am working on a mobile app for Psyches of Color, a nonprofit organization dedicated to raising mental health awareness for Black and Latinx communities.
projects.contributions: Developing core app features, ensuring secure authentication, and maintaining code quality.
projects.bullets: Developing the app using React Native, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.|Implementing secure environment variables for sensitive data handling.|Establishing coding standards with Prettier and ESLint for maintainability.

projects.title: YouLostIt
projects.description: YouLostIt is a privacy-focused lost item tracker developed as part of the CSE 190: Wireless Embedded Systems course.
projects.contributions: Designed game mechanics, improved UI, and enhanced user experience.
projects.bullets: Designed a motion detection system on STM32 to simulate a lost-tag tracker.|Implemented I2C communication and LED feedback for real-time motion alerts.|Utilized ITM Console debugging for optimized hardware communication.|Developed firmware to manage sensors, radios, and power efficiently.

projects.title: Mario's Playground
projects.description: Developed as part of the WIC project teams, this Nintendo-themed website offers a collection of interactive games featuring beloved characters.
projects.bullets: Designed and developed the MarioCoinfall game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.|Implemented player movement, coin collection, and bomb collision mechanics.|Built a Mario-themed homepage with intuitive navigation and interactive elements.|Optimized code for smooth performance across devices.
projects.contributions: Integrated scheduling, improved communication, and optimized volunteer coordination.

projects.title: Nova Spero
projects.description: As part of UCSD's Design for Development course, my team partnered with Nova Spero, a nonprofit organization dedicated to supporting refugee communities through education.
projects.bullets: Integrated Google Calendar for streamlined scheduling.| Developed tools for efficient carpool coordination.|Implemented Remind App integration for mass communication.|Organized Google Drive for structured data management.
projects.contributions: Designed motion detection logic, developed firmware, and optimized power consumption.
